title: Design of a Constructivist-Based Occupational Therapy Distance Education Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical terminology and introductory knowledge of occupational therapy
context.additional_context: Blended learning environment combining online platforms and face-to-face practice, enhancing peer collaboration and self-directed inquiry activities

learning_goals: Learners can create a digital portfolio analyzing real-world cases based on core occupational therapy theories
They can improve occupational therapy intervention plans through peer feedback exchange using collaborative tools
They can demonstrate step-by-step application processes of occupational therapy assessment tools in a virtual simulation environment
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
